description: Use the browser.contextualIdentities API to query and modify contextual identity, also called as containers.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Retrieves information about a single contextual identity.

parameters.name: cookieStoreId
parameters.description: The ID of the contextual identity cookie store.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Information to filter the contextual identities being retrieved.

name.description: Filters the contextual identity by name.

functions.name: create
functions.description: Creates a contextual identity with the given data.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Details about the contextual identity being created.

name.description: The name of the contextual identity.

color.description: The color of the contextual identity.

icon.description: The icon of the contextual identity.

functions.name: update
functions.description: Updates a contextual identity with the given data.

parameters.name: cookieStoreId
parameters.description: The ID of the contextual identity cookie store.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Details about the contextual identity being created.

name.description: The name of the contextual identity.

color.description: The color of the contextual identity.

icon.description: The icon of the contextual identity.

functions.name: remove
functions.description: Deletes a contetual identity by its cookie Store ID.

parameters.name: cookieStoreId
parameters.description: The ID of the contextual identity cookie store.
